name: Sweet Easter Quick Bread
author: JENRE
summary: A delicious Easter favorite from the islands. The time it takes to make this dish is worth it when you bite into a tantalizing piece. It tastes even more excellent served warm with butter or cheese.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large saucepan, combine beer, sugar and butter over medium-low heat
When the ingredients melt into each other remove from the stove top and let cool
When the mixture is cool, mix in beaten eggs and vanilla extract
In a large bowl, combine flour,  baking powder, raisins and mixed fruits
Stir beer mixture slowly into the dry mixture, incorporating and mixing as you go
Pour mixture into the prepared loaf pans
Bake in a preheated 350 degrees F (175 degrees C) oven for 90 minutes
